short_description:
Comprehensive List of Badges You Can Include in Your README:

1. `Image: GitHub API Badge <https://img.shields.io/badge/-GitHub-blue>`_
   (replace with your company's or project's name)
2. `Image: Coveralls Badge <https://coveralls.io/r/USERNAME>`_
3. `Image: PyPI Server Badge <https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/-PACKAGENAME>`_
4. `Image: Python-Server Badge <https://pypi.org/project/-PROJECT->`_
5. `Image: Conda-Forge Badge <https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/-/conda-forge>`_
6. `Image: Monthly Download Count Badge <https://pepy.tech/user/-USERNAME>`_
7. `Image: Twitter Link Badge <https://img.shields.io/twitter/url/-USERNAME>`_
8. `Image: PyScaffold Badge <https://pyscaffold.org/>`_
9. |assistant|
10. `PyScaffold-Notes`: Add a brief description of your project here!
author: nathfavour
